item.title: Trailers of the week: Captain America, F1, and Gladiator II
item.description:
There’s a bit of a theme of payoff in this week’s trailers. Anthony Mackie finally takes the lead on the big screen after 10 years in the MCU; Ridley Scott’s two-decade-plus plan for a Gladiator sequel is coming to fruition; and we finally get to find out what happens next to the macrodata refinement team in Severance.

There’s a lot to go through this week, from big-budget tentpole movies to whimsical TV, so let’s get down to it, starting, naturally, with the MCU.

Captain America: Brave New World

In the trailer for Captain America: Brave New World, Thaddeus Ross (Harrison Ford) wants to make Sam Wilson (Anthony Mackie) part of the US military once more. He’s clearly put off by the idea, but is forced to jump into the fray after super...

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Wes Davis

item.title: Video shows 'groundbreaking' electric aircraft complete test flight with no-runway takeoff: 'A tremendous engineering feat'
